title: League Client Error 0xc00000005
body: I just wanted to hop on to League for my first time in a month, but I started the client and it gave me the error. I reinstalled League which didn't end up working so I started to look up fixes. I have checked all Antivirus software and uninstalled Razer, but nothing worked. I need help

replies.body: Typically that error means that something is blocking League from being able to run properly. A lot of times it's due to your OS blocking the program from thinking it's some sort of virus, but you can fix that up by reconfiguring your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Also double check that your antivirus still has all of the right exceptions so that League can access our servers.
